所有类

  • 类概要 
    类 说明
    AddDishes
    ClassName: AddDishes
    Description: This is the GUI interface of adding dishes with ranking options
    AddExtraDishes
    ClassName: AddExtraDishes
    Description: This is the GUI interface of adding extra dishes
    AddOption
    ClassName: AddOption
    Description: This is the GUI interface of adding another option to the existing dish
    AddPayment
    ClassName: AddPayment
    Description: This is the GUI interface of adding another payment way for the customer
    AutomaticReport
    ClassName: AutomaticReport
    Description: This is the GUI interface of configure the email setting.
    Compulsory
    ClassName: Compulsory
    Description: This is the entity class that used to store
    the information about single compulsory dish read from file
    CompulsoryFile
    ClassName: CompulsoryFile
    Description: This is the control class that used to operate on
    the 'compulsory.json' file which contains all the information about compulsory dishes in json format.
    CompulsoryInfo
    ClassName: CompulsoryInfo
    Description: This is the information class that used to control
    the information about the compulsory dishes read from file
    DishAddChoose
    ClassName: DishAddChoose
    Description: This is the GUI interface of choosing the dish
    that wants to add has ranking options(three options) or just simple option(one option)
    Email
    ClassName: Email
    Description: This is the entity class that used to store
    the information about an email
    EmailFile
    ClassName: EmailFile
    Description: This is the control class that used to operate on
    the 'email.json' file which contains all the information about email in json format.
    Extra
    ClassName: Extra
    Description: This is the entity class that used to store
    the information about single extra dish read from file
    ExtraFile
    ClassName: ExtraFile
    Description: This is the control class that used to operate on
    the 'extra.json' file which contains all the information about extra dishes in json format.
    ExtraInfo
    ClassName: ExtraInfo
    Description: This is the information class that used to control
    the information about the extra dishes read from file
    Login
    ClassName: Login
    Description: This is the control class that used to control the manager login process
    managementOptions
    ClassName: managementOptions
    Description: This is the GUI interface of choosing managing services(modify menu, see report, add payment)
    managePayment
    ClassName: managePayment
    Description: This is the GUI interface of managing the payment.
    Like setting availability, adding or deleting a payment way.
    managerLogin
    ClassName: managerLogin
    Description: This is the GUI interface of doing the authorization of manager
    ModifyCompulsory
    ClassName: ModifyCompulsory
    Description: This is the control class that used to control
    the compulsory dishes.
    ModifyCompulsoryDish
    ClassName: ModifyCompulsoryDish
    Description: This is the GUI setting interface of a compulsory dish.
    Function contains: adding options, changing option availability, deleting this dish.
    ModifyExtra
    ClassName: ModifyExtra
    Description: This is the control class that used to control the extra dishes.
    Like adding dishes, deleting dishes, setting price.
    ModifyExtraDish
    ClassName: ModifyExtraDish
    Description: This is the GUI setting interface of an extra dish.
    Function contains: changing dish price, changing option availability, deleting this dish.
    ModifyMenu
    ClassName: ModifyMenu
    Description: This is the GUI interface of choosing which dish to modify or choosing to add a dish.
    ModifyPayment
    ClassName: ModifyPayment
    Description: This is the control class that used to control the payment ways.
    Like adding payment, deleting payment, setting availability.
    Payment
    ClassName: Payment
    Description: This is the entity class that used to store
    the information about a payment way read from file
    PaymentFile
    ClassName: PaymentFile
    Description: This is the control class that used to operate on
    the 'payment.json' file which contains all the information about payment ways in json format.
    PaymentInfo
    ClassName: PaymentInfo
    Description: This is the information class that used to control
    the information about the payment ways read from file
    Report
    ClassName: Report
    Description: This is the entity class that used to store
    the information about a report read from file
    ReportFile
    ClassName: ReportFile
    Description: This is the control class that used to operate on
    the 'report' director which contains all the reports about the sales condition in .png format.
    ReportInfo
    ClassName: ReportInfo
    Description: This is the information class that used to control
    the information about the reports read from file
    ReportShow
    ClassName: ReportShow
    Description: This is the GUI interface showing the report of business condition in the last seven days
    SetEmail
    ClassName: SetEmail
    Description: This is the medium class that used to control
    the setting about the sending email service
    SimpleOption
    ClassName: SimpleOption
    Description: This is the GUI interface of adding dishes with simple options(yes or no)
